m2mimud.game
Interface PlayerCommunicator

All Known Implementing Classes:
Interface
public interface PlayerCommunicator

The PlayerCommunicator is an interface for any object which wishes to communicate with the player. It provides the ability to send system and error message to the user, as well as request input

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clears the output window
 void clearCombatLog()
          Clears the combat window
 void disable()
          Disables the communicator.
 void enable()
          Enables the communicator

          Prints a combat message

setStatus

void setStatus(boolean equi,

Sets the player's status

Parameters:
equi - True if the player has mental equilibrium
balance - True if the playter has physical balance

printCombatMessage

void printCombatMessage(java.lang.String line,
                        java.awt.Color theColor,
                        boolean player)
Prints a combat message

Parameters:
line - The line to print
theColor - The color to paint the text
player - A value which indicates if the player generated this text, or the player's target. If the message is generated by te player's target, the message is bolded.
